lore: &7This action will send you a given message.
&b&lFormat: &3MESSAGE!the message you want to be send to the player
actions: MESSAGE!&3Hello there, this is a test message.

lore: &7This action will execute a command on behalf of the console.
&b&lFormat: &3CONSOLE_COMMAND!the command you want to execute without slash
actions: CONSOLE_COMMAND!tell {player} This is a console-executed command

lore: &7This action will execute a command on behalf of the player.
&b&lFormat: &3PLAYER_COMMAND!the command you want the player to execute without slash
actions: PLAYER_COMMAND!tell {player} I am technically whispering this to myself

lore: &7This action will play a Minecraft sound to you.
&b&lFormat: &3SOUND!the minecraft sound you want to play
&7This will delay any action you want.
&7In this case it'll be a message delayed for 60 ticks (3s)
actions: delay!60!MESSAGE!&7This message was delayed 60 ticks (3 seconds)

lore: &7This action will send you to another server.
&b&lFormat: &3SEND!the server you want to get send to
&3-> Must include the server name as "server" json element
actions: MESSAGE!&aCheck the lore of this item for a bit of documentation.

lore: &3-> Or TITLE!title|subtitle and apply default fade times
&7This action will queue you for a server.
&3-> Must include the server name as "server" json element in order
actions: MESSAGE!&aCheck the lore of this item for a bit of documentation.

lore: &7This action will queue you for a list of servers.
&3-> You can only show data of one server, using the "server" json element
actions: MESSAGE!&aCheck the lore of this item for a bit of documentation.

lore: &7This action will teleport you to a specific location.
&7This action will enable a Minecraft effect.
&7This action will send a text component with a clickable URL.
actions: URL!https://github.com/iTeije/ServerSelector|&3ServerSelector is a open source project, watch it on GitHub.|&bClick here to go to GitHub.
